subject: Send Money Worldwide
body:
Send Money Worldwide
FROM THE DESK OF THE FIDELITY BANK
MONEY TRANSFER AGENT
COTONOU, REPUBLIC OF BENIN.
WEBSITE; www. westernunion.com
Dear Beneficiary,
To The Owner Of This E-mail, How are you today, I write to inform you that we
have already sent you USD5000.00 dollars through Western union as we have been
given the mandate to transfer your full compensation payment total sum of
USD850,000.00 via western union by this government.
I was calling your telephone number to give you the information through phone
but you did not pick up my calls throughout that yesterday even this
morning. Now, I decided to email you the MTCN and sender name so that you will
pick up this USD5000.00 to enable us send another USD5000.00 today as you know
we will be sending to you USD5000.00 per day.
Please pick up this information and run to western union to pick up the
USD5000.00 and call back to send you another payment today,our direct phone
line is +229/ 51559736, Manager Mr Chris Patrick
Email:(
fidelitybankusa5@gmail.com
)
call or email once you picked up this USD5000.00 today.
Here is the western union information to pick up the Money; MTCN:0431713425
Sender's Name: Ifeanyi Michael. Text Question: HOW MUCH, Answer:$5000
Amountâ€™s $5000.00 I am waiting for your call once you pick up this
USD5000.00,Please email your direct telephone number because I need to be
calling you once we send any payment for the information.
Contact Manager Mr. Chris Patrick
Phone +229/ 51559736
Thanks
JAMES OSUMAN

subject: Re: Send Money Worldwide
body:
Hello James Osuman,

I hope this message finds you well. I'm quite surprised to receive your email, but it's a pleasant surprise nonetheless. 

I must say, the information you've shared is intriguing. However, I have a few questions that I'd like to clarify before proceeding further.

Firstly, could you please provide more details about the mandate for transferring my payment via Western Union? Who exactly has given this mandate?

Secondly, you mentioned that you tried calling me yesterday and this morning. Unfortunately, I didn't receive any calls. Could there be an issue with the phone number you have on file?

Lastly, regarding the MTCN and sender name - could you please explain what these are and how they work? 

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Minnie
